about_the_game:
Get all the uncensored sexy full color art from the Morningdew Farms game, as well as commentary from the creators about the journey we went on to make this game!

This Full Color art book includes:
Early Character Design of Nuzzler
Reasons We Made a Gay Farming Game
Threesome, Twosome, and Solo CGs
Numerous Money Shots
Two or More CGs on Every Page
The Art Creation and Collaboration Process
How To Successfully Launch a Kickstarter
Tips on Making Your Own Visual Novel

HOW TO GET YOUR DLC:
Once you purchase and install/download the Art Book in the DLC list of Morningdew Farms in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Morningdew Farms) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the art book in this folder.

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic illustrations of sex between two or more males.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64 or Newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 7 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+ or Newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 7 MB available space

name: Morningdew Farms - Art Book

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP System Pack 1 or Newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
